title: Topic 002 Question 021
body: You have an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named contoso.com that contains the users shown in the following table.
Azure AD Privileged Identity Management (PIM) is used in contoso.com.
In PIM, the Password Administrator role has the following settings:
✑ Send email notifying admins of activation: Disable
✑ Require incident/request ticket number during activation: Disable
✑ Require Azure Multi-Factor Authentication for activation: Enable
✑ Require approval to activate this role: Enable
You assign users the Password Administrator role as shown in the following table.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
